feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Blizzard Warning issued December 06 at 4:10AM AKST until December 07 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulation of 4 to 12 inches. Winds gusting 40 to 60 mph. Visibility as low as one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Thursday.

entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with reduced visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 inches. entry.cap:areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp
